backend.medicalservice.Appointments.services

Interface PrescriptionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrescriptionServiceImpl

    public interface PrescriptionService
    This interface defines the methods for managing prescriptions and related documents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileNamesByEmail(java.lang.String patientEmail)
      Retrieves a list of prescription document file names associated with a patient's email.
      PrescriptionEO getDocumentByFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
      Retrieves a prescription document by its file name.
      java.lang.String uploadDocument(java.lang.String patientEmail, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Uploads a prescription document for a specific patient.

    • Method Detail

      • uploadDocument

        java.lang.String uploadDocument(java.lang.String patientEmail,
                                org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
        Uploads a prescription document for a specific patient.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient associated with the prescription.
        file - The prescription document file to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the success or failure of the document upload.

      • getDocumentByFileName

        PrescriptionEO getDocumentByFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves a prescription document by its file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the prescription document file.
        Returns:
        The PrescriptionEO object representing the prescription document, or null if not found.

      • fileNamesByEmail

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileNamesByEmail(java.lang.String patientEmail)
        Retrieves a list of prescription document file names associated with a patient's email.
        Parameters:
        patientEmail - The email of the patient whose prescription document file names are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A list of prescription document file names.
